product_name: Shimano Deore/Sun Rhyno Lite Disc MTB 29er Rear Wheel
long_description: Tried and true, the Shimano Deore/Sun Rhyno Lite Disc MTB 29er rear wheel offers excellent value and performance for your 29er. 32-hole Sun Rhyno Lite rim uses triple-box design to maximize sturdiness; rim is Presta valve compatible. 14-gauge spokes are laced 3-cross onto hubs for excellent strength and durability. Double contact seals on Shimano Deore hub shut out water and dust; replaceable free-hub body is compatible with 8- or 9-speed cassettes. Hub is ISO 6-bolt disc-compatible; rim sidewalls are brushed for enhanced braking with rim brakes. Quick-release skewer included; 135mm rear axle spacing. Please note: rim tape is not included with the Shimano Deore/Sun Rhyno Lite MTB 29er rear wheel.
short_description: Tried and true, the Shimano Deore/Sun Rhyno Lite Disc MTB 29er rear wheel offers excellent value and performance for your 29er.
